content: You are a helpful assistant who is good at identifying named entities and their relations.

Paragraph: Intracerebroventricular injection of ethacrynic acid (50 % convulsive dose ; 50 micrograms / mouse) accelerated the synthesis / turnover of 5 - hydroxytryptamine (5 - HT) but suppressed the synthesis of gamma - aminobutyric acid and acetylcholine in mouse brain .

Step 1: Identify the "Disease" entity.
There is no mention of a specific disease in the paragraph, so there is no "Disease" entity to identify.

Step 2: Identify the "Chemical" entity.

- Ethacrynic acid

Therefore, the identified "Chemical" entity is "Ethacrynic acid".
